name: Dice Card Battle
description:
This game was made for a 20 hour in-engine jam.

Engine and default audio: Yoji Ojima/RPG Maker

Art: FleshToDust

In this game you play the role of a great swordsman but soon find out your sword will do you no good. You will have to learn the ways of card battles to progress.

Card battles play out like so:

You and your opponent have Hit Points(HP) and you draw cards to recover and inflict damage. Whoever reaches 0 HP first loses.
